website_summaries.verdict: When looking for a larger double-sided dry erase board but still need mobility, this well-built unit is also backed by a lifetime guarantee.
pros: the necessary hardware is included, and there's a helpful how-to video online with step-by-step instructions
The brakes lock the wheels when in place to provide stability
Surface is easy to clean and excellent for presentations when a white screen is needed as background
cons: Can be cumbersome to move alone

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for a better seller or product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these we've bought for our business. They are well made, easy to put together and perfect for our needs. The whiteboard came very well packaged and was undamaged. Shipping was fast and the delivery men brought it up to our suite and placed it in the office where we needed it. Absolutely five stars for the product and especially 5 stars for the seller. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Annear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent white board.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly. I have bought two of these boards through Amazon. I love white boards and use them extensively to brainstorm, organize and remind myself of important events and facts. I have not been disappointed. Assembly is straightforward. The package even comes with a wrench and Phillips head screwdriver. The first board I bought I have had for over 2 years already. It is still functions perfectly. What else is there to say. It is a great white board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best white board
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today. We assembled it in less than 1 hour. All screw holes lined up perfectly. No imperfections on either surface. Well padded packaging and the delivery man called before arrival. I recommend this white board for anyone who has the need for visual planning. The wheels work well and it moves very easily and is stable. The two sides are magnetic. The surfaces of the metal frame and white board are coated with a removable protective plastic sheeting that must be removed. All of the surfaces are pristine. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Nancymarie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Find a different whiteboard.
customer_reviews.text: Whiteboard was rippled on one side and the holes to screw the tray to the frame were misaligned. Also, when put together, the frame is not perfectly square. Does not prevent tilting or tuning the board or impair function, but just another indicator of slipshod construction. Too much trouble to return, given the size, so we are just using one side and re-drilling tray holes (and yeah, I tried just rotating the tray to the other side).
customer_reviews.author: MidwesternUS

customer_reviews.title: Our Veterans love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as part of a grant of theHuntsville, Al Elks Lodge #1648. We donated it to our local State Veterans Home (Floyd E “Tut” Fann). The activities director uses it for game boards, movies, etc. it was the size she requested and is mobile. It is used every day. Thanks you for being there for us. Dianna Wilson, Elks Lodge Secretary
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great communication. Fast delivery. Product 'as advertised'.
customer_reviews.text: Communication was excellent, with e-mails and phone calls throughout the process from ordering to delivery (and even afterwards to 'check in'). Easy to assemble, although you will need a power drill to fully secure the marker tray. My only issue was that the board had a 'ding' on one side even though there did not appear to be any shipping damage. Very happy with the purchase and service overall.
customer_reviews.author: School Administrator

customer_reviews.title: awesome & huge board for the value
customer_reviews.text: This board is awesome for the price. Although it's not as sturdy as the $600+ boards. BUT - it does exactly what i need it to. It's perfect for a home office. The frame flexes ever so slightly. The wheels could be better quality - easily replaceable. The writing surface is great. It's HUGE. It's got a tray for markers. It's well packaged, even though some people noted damage. I'm quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: ben ho

customer_reviews.title: Nice board for the price
customer_reviews.text: This unit is actually quite nice for the price. The quality wheels and the tightening handles worked well. The board snap could use a small piece of rubber for a quiet hold, but overall it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: SoundMan

customer_reviews.title: One of my best buys of the year. Super happy with this one.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about ordering these because of the freight shipping BUT... I was very pleasantly surprised. It came VERY well packaged and the delivery guys brought it right in to my garage. Not a scratch or a dent on it. Easy to assemble , looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy. Like the 2 sided availability and that they are magnetic and easy to move. Assembly is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Pee Wee

customer_reviews.title: Good whiteboard that feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good whiteboard that feels sturdy, offers a bunch of space, moves nicely. Shipping took a little while longer than expected but not a big deal when something that big comes from across the country.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: Love it - sturdy, arrived in good shape (the outer box was a little dinged up but the inner box was fine). Assembly was a bit of a challenge - better directions would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: James W

customer_reviews.title: Not all that, unfortunately...
customer_reviews.text: The board was missing 2 knobs that allow you to tighten it when in position. It also had a long dent in one side, as you can see in the picture. As a standalone single-sided board, it's ok. For the price, though, it's quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Staggs

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last week for use at my church. I was contacted very quickly by the seller to confirm delivery time since is actually delivered, not just shipped by FedEx or UPS. It was delivered 2 days after I ordered it! It was easy to assemble, is very sturdy, and has a huge writing surface. It is fantastic quality. I could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Dent in the whiteboard but still good
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and fairly easy to put together. It arrived with a dent on one side of the board but the company offered a 30% discount which we are very happy with. They did offer to replace the whiteboard but it would be too much of a hassle to box it up and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Furrer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The marker board works well. One side is nice and smooth, the second side has a wrinkle on it, but I got a good price, so we let it slide.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: makes noise when writing on it
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our conference room and when someone writes on it, it makes a creaking kind of noise. Not too big of a distraction, but would be nice if it were quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No loose nuts for this happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time as promised. Delivery was spot on the minute expected. Having put together hundreds of such things needing bolts and screws, this was by far the best experience ever. All parts (and some spares) were present. Tools provided! Holes all the right size and they lined up perfectly! Quality of the board and stand is excellent. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: FL Fred

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, good quality, erases well. This board is a nice size and moves well from place to place. It's a good substitute for a board on the wall and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lanthonyprice

customer_reviews.title: great board at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional board. this is the second whiteboard ive purchased (my previous was a quartet). Im very happy with this purchase, easy to assemble and there was no damage to the product at all. only draw back is the wheels are a bit too small for this size board so it is not the easiest to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent board but arrived with a dent in it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice board but it came with a 2” dent in the middle of it :( no way to pop it out either.
customer_reviews.author: DS Distribution

customer_reviews.title: It is a great board. Just what we were looking for andf ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great board. Just what we were looking for andf the price seemed very reasonable. Delivered to our door! What a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Terry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I'm a swim coach and love using it at our new pool!
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and was in excellent condition when we received it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Crease in the board
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these and one came with a crease in the whiteboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The board is a good value for the dollar but double check the parts ...
customer_reviews.text: The board is a good value for the dollar but double check the parts and board. Ours arrived with a damaged board.
customer_reviews.author: Sawdust

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged, clearly defective product, but was blamed on shipping. Looking at other reviews, typical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great board for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great board for the money. Most of the boards I looked at were very expensive. This one is built very well for the money and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hashier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my training needs
customer_reviews.text: Came as pictured and described. Perfect for my training needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Great Board as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This item certainly met our expectations. Directions were pretty sparse (mostly pictures) but we were able to assemble with no problems in about 30 minutes and it was nice to have all the tools required for assembly as well as extra wescrews, nuts and bolts included. We will order this item again when we need a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McCay Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I Love the board and its efficiency for presentations
customer_reviews.text: I Love the board and its efficiency for presentations. The only reason I gave it a one star is because it came with serious scratches right in the center of the board - on both sides!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Jerahian

customer_reviews.title: Nice board, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to re-drill the holes for the tray because they did not line up. But otherwise, the board is exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: mvaline

customer_reviews.title: The department loved these boards
customer_reviews.text: The department loved these boards, easy to move around and very large. I recommend it, you can use both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good White board
customer_reviews.text: This white board is so very useful. It is a large 6' long white board that you can take anywhere and there's two sides to mark up. The install wasn't too bad. It arrived a day or two late but otherwise the final product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product!!! Exactly what I needed... Very simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this board so much. I have bought another one for my Company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved 400 bucks!
customer_reviews.text: All I could ask for!! One caster doesn't work but minor!!
customer_reviews.author: Jd Dunson

customer_reviews.title: Rollers
customer_reviews.text: Great for projects and meetings ! Can be moved from conference room to conference room.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great board but some difficulties in constructing it!
customer_reviews.text: The board was really solid and nice. It will be a nice addition to our office. I like being able to wheel it in and out of different rooms during meetings. I like the overall size and design. The only issue I had was during the construction and the parts that came with it. When we were building it stand, the bolts and nails did not fit together well and we had to add additional washers to tighten it. The tray had tiny holes which did not line up when we were screwing in the nails. Overall the board is great and I am very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

product_meta.title: Luxor Mobile 72"W x 40"H Dry Erase Double-Sided Magnetic Whiteboard with Aluminum Frame and Stand
product_meta.description: Built for brainstorming, teaching or organizing ideas and information, a Luxor magnetic dry erase board doubles the writing space and delivers the durable mobility needed for dynamic workspaces. A slender-yet-sturdy steel frame provides a professional appearance and rolling casters make it easy move around a room. To flip the board, simply loosen the side knobs and disengage the spring-loaded locking clip. Need to display charts, papers or photos? Use the magnetic surface as a bulletin board. Look no further for a high-quality, affordable mobile marker board.
feature_bullets: Easily flip the reversible board for twice the writing area
Painted steel surface resists ghosting and provides excellent erasability. Magnetic surfaces allow users to display papers or posters
1" aluminum frame gives professional and clean appearance. Great mobility with four casters, two with locking brakes
Full-length marker/eraser tray provides ample room for board materials
Overall Dimension: 74.5"W x 23"D x 69"H. Board Dimension: 72"W x 40"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
